name: S10w Space
description:
S10w Time Controls
  • You have 10 seconds before the Time Fuel engine explodes
  • Move around with the Mouse
  • Avoid bullets at all costs!!
  • Once you have some time fuel stored press SPACE to use it
  • Keep moving to avoid bullets, your enemies have a clear aim at you
Bombs help you to get rid of the enemy bullets. Hearts maintain the time fuel engine for exploding.
